ee.bpw.dhx.ws.service

Interface DhxImplementationSpecificService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleDhxImplementationSpecificService

    public interface DhxImplementationSpecificService
    Interface which declares methods that are needed for DHX web services to work, but those methods are not implemented by DHX ws itself.
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isDuplicatePackage

        boolean isDuplicatePackage(ee.bpw.dhx.model.InternalXroadMember from,
                           java.lang.String consignmentId)
                    throws ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method searches through saved documents and checks if document with same sender and consignment id exists.
        Parameters:
        from - - document sender to check
        consignmentId - - consignment id to check
        Returns:
        - true if document with same sender and consignment id exists, otherwise false
        Throws:
        ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • receiveDocument

        java.lang.String receiveDocument(ee.bpw.dhx.model.IncomingDhxPackage document,
                                 org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext context)
                          throws ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method should receive document(save in database for example) and return unique id of it. Id will be sent as receipt in response.
        Parameters:
        document - - document to receive
        context - - if something is missing in document, then there is opportunity to take it from context
        Returns:
        - unique id of the document that was saved.
        Throws:
        ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while receiving document

      • getRepresentationList

        java.util.List<ee.bpw.dhx.model.DhxRepresentee> getRepresentationList()
                                                               throws ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method returns list of representees.
        Returns:
        List of representees that are represented by that X-road member or empty List if there are no representees.
        Throws:
        ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • getAdresseeList

        java.util.List<ee.bpw.dhx.model.InternalXroadMember> getAdresseeList()
                                                              throws ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Method returns adressees list from local storage(DB for example). Method does not renew adressees list from X-road.
        Returns:
        - adressees list from local storage
        Throws:
        ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • saveAddresseeList

        void saveAddresseeList(java.util.List<ee.bpw.dhx.model.InternalXroadMember> members)
                throws ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Methods saves adressees list to local storage(DB for example). This method is called after renewing adressees list from X-road.
        Parameters:
        members - - list of the adressees to save
        Throws:
        ee.bpw.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs

      • saveSendResult

        void saveSendResult(ee.bpw.dhx.model.DhxSendDocumentResult finalResult,
                    java.util.List<ee.bpw.dhx.model.AsyncDhxSendDocumentResult> retryResults)
        If using asynchronous document sending. Then this method is a callback for receiving sendDocument results. This method is used for both success and fail.
        Parameters:
        finalResult - - last result of the package sending. Contains both package that was sent(including recipient and other information) and sending result, either success or fail. If sending was unsucessfull then final results response parameter will contain fault.
        retryResults - - contains information about all retries that were done. Meant for debugging or history saving or something like that.
